sentences.en: Avoid any gossip and be careful that you aren't misinterpreted.
sentences.cn: 要尽量避免闲言碎语,注意不要让别人误解自己.

sentences.en: But that view is now being questioned by Joseph Silk at the University of Oxford and colleagues, who say it's possible that the WMAP observations have been misinterpreted.
sentences.cn: 但是，牛津大学的约瑟夫·修克及同事对这个观点提出了质疑。 他说，威尔金森微波探测器的观察结果有可能被误解了。

sentences.en: Everybody had him focused wrong, and necessarily misinterpreted his performance every time.
sentences.cn: 大伙儿都错看了他, 并且对他的所作所为每次都必然作出错误的解释.

sentences.en: He misinterpreted her silence as indicating agreement.
sentences.cn: 他误以为她的沉默就是同意.

sentences.en: His comments were misinterpreted as a criticism of the project.
sentences.cn: 他的评论被误解为对这个项目的批评。

sentences.en: I realized that what I'd said could be misinterpreted as criticism.
sentences.cn: 我意识到我的话可能被误解为批评.

sentences.en: In a marriage, the common symptoms of the disorder — distraction, disorganization, forgetfulness — can easily be misinterpreted as laziness, selfishness and a lack of love and concern.
sentences.cn: 婚姻中，该疾病的普遍症状，即注意力不集中、生活没有条理以及健忘，通常被误解为懒惰、自私和缺少对他人的关爱。

sentences.en: It is now inexplicable how that development was misinterpreted.
sentences.cn: 当时对这一事态发展的错误理解究竟是怎么产生的,现在已经无法说清楚了.

sentences.en: Piggy saw the smile and misinterpreted it as friendliness.
sentences.cn: 猪崽子看到微笑,却误以为是友好的表示.

sentences.en: She misinterpreted my silence as giving consent.
sentences.cn: 她把我的沉默误解为答应.

sentences.en: Sustainable development is often misinterpreted as focusing solely on environmental issues.
sentences.cn: 可持续发展是经常误解为独自环保议题.

sentences.en: The Prince's words had been misinterpreted.
The rioter misinterpreted the instructions of the police.
sentences.cn: 暴徒们错误地解释了警察的指示.

sentences.en: Their interpretation was faulty — they had misinterpreted things.
sentences.cn: 他们的理解是错误的——他们将事情曲解了。

sentences.en: These teachings can be crassly misinterpreted.
sentences.cn: 这些教义可能会被愚蠢地曲解。

sentences.en: Too much eye contact can be misinterpreted as staring.
sentences.cn: 太频繁的眼神接触会被误解为盯着对方.

sentences.en: What you mean as a casual remark could be misinterpreted.
sentences.cn: 你随便说的一句话，可能就被曲解了。

trans.tran_cn: 误解，曲解( misinterpret的过去式和过去分词 )
